title: Engine Efficiency Plot
description: Plots engine efficiency based on load. Great for mechanical insight.

title: Pipe Heat Loss Simulation
description: Simulates conductive and convective heat loss in pipes.

title: Fuel Efficiency Prediction
description: Predicts car MPG using simple linear regression based on features like horsepower and weight.

title: Fuel Efficiency ML (Advanced)
description: Compares multiple ML models (Linear, Random Forest) on the Auto MPG dataset.

title: Fuel Predict GUI
description: A desktop GUI app using Tkinter that predicts fuel efficiency with a trained model.

title: Model Training Script
description: Trains and saves a fuel efficiency prediction model for later use in applications.
